EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name}}, Join Us For A Spectacular Dinner At Obica
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/2141099/Pure-Storage-Jessica-Harper-Customer-Panel-and-Dinner-Obica-2-0> JOIN THE FLASH REVOLUTION WITH EPLUS, PURE STORAGE AND VMTURBO AT OBICA WEDNESDAY, JUNE 10TH 2015 | 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM EDT OBICA 928 BROADWAY, NEW YORK, NY 10010
Join us at this exclusive dinner featuring ePlus, Pure Storage and VMTurbo and learn more about how enabling a control system with flash technology leads to ideal decision automation and the healthiest virtual environment.
Enjoy delicious fare and drinks at this modern Italian cucina.
RSVP today to secure your seat - space is limited.
<https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/2141099/Pure-Storage-Jessica-Harper-Customer-Panel-and-Dinner-Obica-2-0>
